name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Umbrella Academy HD Custom New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Umbrella Academy HD Custom New Tab, designed for Umbrella Academy lovers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Umbrella Academy HD New Tab Extension

Transform your browsing experience with the Umbrella Academy HD New Tab Extension! This customizable new tab extension brings the world of the Umbrella Academy straight to your screen with a stunning collection of wallpapers.

Key Features:

Beautiful Background Options: Choose from a range of high-quality, handpicked wallpapers featuring your favorite scenes and characters from Umbrella Academy.

Quick Notes & To-Do Lists: Stay organized with the built-in notes feature, allowing you to quickly jot down reminders or create to-do lists right from your new tab.

Customizable Logo: Personalize your experience by changing or customizing the logo to fit your style and preferences.

Enhance your browser with the iconic visuals of the Umbrella Academy and take control of your new tab with ease!
